text: Hagi Gaza kumate vahe'mo'zama Samsoni'ma ana a'enema emase'ne naneke'ma nentahi'za, ana kumara avazagi kagi'za ana kumamofo kafantera kafona ante'za kenagera mani'naze. Ana kenagera ranke'nankea osu akohe'za mani'ne'za amanage hu'naze, Kafonteta mani'nesunkeno ko'matanigeno esnigeta ahegahune.
